body_html:
Hi Johnson,

Thanks a lot for reaching out! Yash wrote this example model, so I'm not totally sure of the details. But giving it a glance I think you're correct. To account for the regularization terms we would need to sum over all the terms in model.losses. I will confirm with Yash on this and get to you real soon.

Chen

body:
Hi Johnson,

Thanks a lot for reaching out! Yash wrote this example model, so I'm not totally sure of the details. But giving it a glance I think you're correct. To account for the regularization terms we would need to sum over all the terms in `model.losses`. I will confirm with Yash on this and get to you real soon.

Chen
